item.title: 美国建议向 Stellantis 和三星 SDI 电池合资企业提供 75.4 亿美元贷款
item.description: 美国能源部周一表示，拟向汽车制造商 Stellantis 和三星 SDI 的合资企业提供高达 75.4 亿美元的贷款，帮助其在印第安纳州建设两座电动汽车锂离子电池工厂。【原文：The U.S. Energy Department said Monday it is proposing to loan up to $7.54 billion to a joint venture of automaker Stellantis and Samsung SDI to help build two electric vehicle lithium-ion battery plants in Indiana.】

item.title: 美国零售商瞄准 "网络星期一"，推出大幅在线折扣活动
item.description: 在 "黑色星期五"（Black Friday）上，美国商店的消费乏善可陈，而在感恩节长周末之后，零售商们将在其网站和应用程序上推出各种促销活动，吸引人们购买节日礼物和其他商品。【原文：After lackluster spending at U.S. stores on a deals-heavy Black Friday, retailers will be pulling out all the stops with steep promotions on their websites and apps to entice people to buy holiday gifts and other merchandise after the long Thanksgiving weekend.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格将退休
item.description: 芯片制造商英特尔公司周一表示，首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）将从公司退休。【原文：Chipmaker Intel said on Monday CEO Pat Gelsinger will retire from the company.】

item.title: Uber 在克什米尔风景优美的达尔湖上推出游船叫车服务
item.description: 周一，优步（Uber）在印度克什米尔地区风景秀丽的达尔湖（Dal Lake）上推出了水上交通叫车服务，提供游客喜爱的游船搭乘服务。【原文：Uber launched a water transport hailing service on scenic Dal Lake in India's Kashmir region on Monday, offering rides on boats popular with tourists.】

item.title: 巴西 "黑色星期五 "的即时支付交易量翻了一番多
item.description: 巴西中央银行周一的数据显示，巴西流行的即时支付系统 Pix 在 "黑色星期五 "当天记录的交易额比上一年猛增 120.7%。【原文：Brazil's popular instant payment system Pix saw a 120.7% jump in the value of transactions recorded on Black Friday compared to the previous year, central bank data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 亚马逊将试用人工智能设计的除碳材料
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc）计划为数据中心试用一种新的碳清除材料，该交易背后的一家初创公司周一表示，数据中心所使用的人工智能系统有可能导致排放恶化。【原文：Amazon.com Inc plans to pilot a new carbon-removal material for data centers, which are at risk of worsening emissions from artificial intelligence systems they power, a startup behind the deal said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空中客车公司 11 月飞机交付量突破 80 架
item.description: 业内人士称，随着空中客车公司从低迷中复苏，并在实现年终目标方面取得进展，该公司11月份的飞机交付量大幅上升，达到80多架。【原文：Airbus deliveries rose sharply in November to more than 80 jets as the planemaker recovered from a downturn and made progress towards year-end targets, industry sources said.】

item.title: 特朗普的低油价承诺对新兴市场既是风险也是利好
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺 "钻井，宝贝，钻井"，将能源成本减半，这一计划让那些担心美元收益的新兴市场产油国政府不寒而栗，同时也让较贫穷的进口国充满希望。【原文：Donald Trump has promised to "drill, baby, drill" to halve energy costs, a plan that sends shivers through the governments of emerging market oil producers anxious about dollar earnings and fills poorer importing countries with hope.】

item.title: 波罗的海航空公司最早将于 2025 年上半年上市
item.description: 波罗的海航空公司（AirBaltic）首席执行官周一告诉路透社，目前预计该公司最早将于2025年上半年进行首次公开募股，因为该公司的顾问建议其等待欧洲航空业的市场条件改善。【原文：AirBaltic's initial public offering is now expected at the earliest in the first half of 2025, its chief executive told Reuters on Monday, as the airline's advisors suggest it waits for market conditions in the European airline sector to improve.】

item.title: 英伟达是人工智能公司 Nebius Group 7 亿美元融资的投资者之一
item.description: 人工智能基础设施公司Nebius集团周一表示，该公司将从包括英伟达（Nvidia）、Accel和Orbis Investments管理的一些账户在内的投资者处私募融资7亿美元。【原文：AI infrastructure firm Nebius Group on Monday said it was raising $700 million in a private placement from investors including Nvidia , Accel and some accounts managed by Orbis Investments.】

item.title: 独家报道孟加拉因付款纠纷减半从印度阿达尼公司购电
item.description: 孟加拉国政府官员周一告诉路透社记者，由于在高达数亿美元的会费问题上存在分歧，孟加拉国已将从邻国印度阿达尼电力公司（Adani Power）购买的电力减半，理由是冬季需求减少。【原文：Bangladesh has halved the power it buys from neighbouring India's Adani Power, citing lower winter demand, government officials told Reuters on Monday, amid disagreements over dues running into hundreds of millions of dollars.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔可能让美国货币政策再次变得枯燥乏味
item.description: 在过去 17 年的大部分时间里，美联储一直是美国经济政策的核心参与者，为金融体系提供了数万亿美元的安全网，提供了近十年的超低价货币，在 COVID-19 大流行期间跳过了红线，并在公平和气候变化等领域做出了更多努力。【原文：For much of the past 17 years the Federal Reserve has been the central player in U.S. economic policy, throwing multi-trillion-dollar safety nets under the financial system, offering nearly a decade of ultra-cheap money, jumping redlines during the COVID-19 pandemic, and delving more into areas like equity and climate change.】

item.title: 美国 美元因特朗普言论、法国政治和人民币汇率下滑而走软
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 加拿大银行第四季度盈利喜忧参半，房贷续期和降息迫在眉睫
item.description: 加拿大六大银行中有四家预计第四季度盈利将出现增长，因为在降息、大量抵押贷款续期以及边境南部新政府上台的背景下，海湾街（Bay Street）将注意力转向了贷款机构对新一年的预测。【原文：Four out of Canada's six largest banks are expected to show a rise in earnings for the fourth quarter as Bay Street turns its focus to the lenders' forecasts for the new year amid interest rate cuts, a slew of mortgage renewals and a new government south of the border.】

item.title: 如果天气允许，UPS 和联邦快递将准时投递美国节日礼物
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）和联邦快递公司（FedEx）等包裹递送公司受到需求疲软的困扰，这对于希望快速、准时送达节日礼物的美国网购者来说无疑是个好消息。【原文：The weak demand bedeviling package delivery companies like United Parcel Service and FedEx promises to be great news for online U.S. shoppers who want quick, on-time holiday gift delivery.】

item.title: 特斯拉引领 11 月全球市值飙升
item.description: 受首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）与美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关系密切的预期推动，特斯拉的市值在 11 月份的全球顶级公司中增幅最大。【原文：Tesla's market capitalisation increased by the most among top global companies in November, boosted by expectations the automaker will benefit from CEO Elon Musk’s close ties with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 数据密集的一周伊始，期货市场出现下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货在上月录得强劲涨幅后，12 月初开始走低，重点关注本周晚些时候的一系列经济数据，包括就业报告，以衡量美联储的利率路径。【原文：U.S. stock index futures started December lower after recording robust gains last month, with focus on a slate of economic data later this week, including a jobs report, to gauge the Federal Reserve's interest rate path.】

item.title: 美国对东南亚征收新的太阳能关税将抬高价格，削减利润空间
item.description: 分析师表示，美国对东南亚生产商征收新一轮太阳能电池板进口关税预计将抬高消费者价格，并削减生产商的利润空间，但这在很大程度上已在业界预料之中。【原文：A new round of U.S. solar panel import tariffs on Southeast Asian producers is expected to raise consumer prices and cut into producer profit margins, but was largely anticipated by industry, analysts said.】

item.title: 订单枯竭，英国制造业采购经理人指数降至 9 个月低点
item.description: 周一公布的英国制造业活动指数显示，由于国内外客户订单减少以及供应链持续中断导致成本上升，英国制造业出现了九个月来最大幅度的萎缩。【原文：A gauge of British manufacturing activity released on Monday pointed to the sharpest contraction in nine months, as orders from domestic and foreign customers fell and ongoing supply chain disruption pushed up costs.】

item.title: 欧元区 11 月工厂活动大幅下滑；PMI 显示前景黯淡
item.description: 一项调查显示，欧元区制造业活动在上个月急剧下降，需求的进一步下降很可能使该行业在10月份出现一些企稳迹象后即将复苏的希望破灭。【原文：Euro zone manufacturing activity fell sharply last month and a further decline in demand likely dashed any hopes for an imminent recovery after the sector had showed some signs of stabilisation in October, a survey showed.】

item.title: 德国 11 月制造业采购经理人指数显示制造业陷入低迷
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，由于企业在疲软的需求和竞争压力下苦苦挣扎，德国制造业在11月份仍然稳固地处于萎缩状态，这凸显了欧洲最大经济体所面临的持续挑战。【原文：Germany's manufacturing sector remained firmly entrenched in contraction territory in November as firms struggle with weak demand and competitive pressure, highlighting ongoing challenges for Europe's largest economy, a survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 聚焦：为了追求更高的利润率，Stellantis 首席执行官塔瓦雷斯失去了一些核心客户
item.description: 24 岁的埃莱娜-阿拉贡（Elena Aragon）打算购买一辆新车时，在她的家乡西班牙加的斯（Cadiz）考察了一系列廉价品牌，包括斯泰兰特的菲亚特和标致。【原文：When 24-year-old Elena Aragon set out to buy a new car, she reviewed a range of no-frills brands in her home town of Cadiz, Spain, including Stellantis' Fiat and Peugeot.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯可能下调 1 月份面向亚洲的原油价格
item.description: 交易商周一表示，头号石油出口国沙特阿拉伯预计将把一月份面向亚洲买家的原油价格降至多年来的最低点，这在很大程度上与上个月中东基准价格的暴跌有关。【原文：Top oil exporter Saudi Arabia is expected to slash crude prices for Asian buyers in January to the lowest in years, largely tracking a slump in Middle East benchmark prices last month, traders said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲陷入困境的汽车行业计划关闭工厂和裁员
item.description: 由于需求疲软、生产成本高昂、中国竞争对手的竞争以及电动汽车转型速度低于预期，欧洲多家汽车公司最近宣布关闭工厂并大幅裁员。【原文：A slew of automotive companies have recently announced plant closures and big layoffs in Europe as they struggle with weak demand, high production costs, competition from Chinese rivals and slower-than-expected electric vehicle transition.】

item.title: 西班牙 11 月制造业采购经理人指数显示洪水导致制造业增长放缓
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，受东部沿海瓦伦西亚地区严重洪灾的影响，西班牙制造业在11月份的扩张速度有所放缓，但对未来增长的信心依然强劲。【原文：Spain's manufacturing sector expanded at a slower pace in November, hindered by the severe floods in the region of Valencia on the eastern coast, a survey showed on Monday, though confidence in future growth remained robust.】

item.title: 首席执行官塔瓦雷斯辞职后，Stellantis 下跌 3-6
item.description: 在米兰上市的 Stellantis 公司首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）周日突然辞职后，该公司股票周一开盘大幅下跌。【原文：Milan-listed shares in Stellantis were seen opening sharply down on Monday after chief executive Carlos Tavares resigned abruptly on Sunday.】

item.title: 马来西亚敦促中国企业避免利用马来西亚逃避美国关税
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部副部长周一表示，马来西亚已敦促中国公司不要将马来西亚作为 "重新命名 "产品以规避美国关税的基地，因为马来西亚的出口限制越来越多，而且人们对中美贸易战感到担忧。【原文：Malaysia has urged Chinese companies to refrain from using it as a base to "rebadge" products to avoid U.S. tariffs, its deputy trade minister said on Monday, amid increasing export restrictions and concerns of a U.S.-China trade war.】

item.title: 土耳其 11 月制造业 PMI 显示复苏迹象
item.description: 周一的一项商业调查显示，土耳其 11 月份的工厂活动连续第八个月萎缩，产出和新订单均有所放缓，尽管该行业出现了复苏迹象。【原文：Turkish factory activity contracted for the eighth month in a row in November with output and new orders moderating, although the sector showed signs of recovery, a business survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 意大利的税收制度是如何为富人操纵的？
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，意大利的税收制度存在偏差，社会最富有的 7% 人口所缴纳的税款比例低于中低收入者，这加剧了不平等，损害了这个欧洲负债最多国家之一的公共财政。【原文：Italy's tax system is skewed in a way that lets society's wealthiest 7% pay proportionately less tax than low and middle-income earners, a new study shows, fuelling inequality and hurting public finances in one of Europe's most indebted nations.】

item.title: 阿达尼电力公司称没有迹象表明孟加拉国会审查电力交易
item.description: 阿达尼电力公司（Adani Power）周一表示，没有迹象表明孟加拉国政府正在审查与该公司签订的购电协议，而此前一天，路透社报道称该国正在寻求重新谈判该协议。【原文：Adani Power on Monday said it has no indication that the Bangladesh government is reviewing a power purchase agreement with the company, a day after Reuters reported that the country is looking to renegotiate the deal.】
